comments.comments_text: Emil Forsberg (RB Leipzig) swings in the corner, but fails to find any of his teammates. One of the defenders reacts superbly to get it clear.

comments.comments_text: GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot by Emil Forsberg (RB Leipzig) low into the left of the net, giving goalkeeper Simon Mignolet no chance!

comments.comments_text: It's in! Andre Silva (RB Leipzig) finds space in the box and from close range powers an unstoppable header into the bottom left corner after a cheeky lofted pass from Angelino. 0:3.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: It's in! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) finds space in the box and from close range powers an unstoppable header into the bottom left corner after a cheeky lofted pass from [PLAYER]. 0:3.

comments.comments_text: Charles de Ketelaere (Club Brugge) takes the corner, but one of the defenders reacts well and rises highest to head the ball away. Club Brugge KV force a corner. They send men into the box.

comments.comments_text: Charles de Ketelaere (Club Brugge) sends in a poor cross from the corner and Josep Martinez has no trouble gathering it.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Emil Forsberg (RB Leipzig) weaves his way past opponents, and he unleashes a magnificent effort from the edge of the box into the bottom left corner. Simon Mignolet had no chance of reaching it. The score is 0:4.

comments.comments_text: The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet of Christopher Nkunku (RB Leipzig) just outside the box. He doesn't think twice and fires a brilliant shot into the bottom left corner. His attempt was beyond the reach of Simon Mignolet. 0:5.
